name: Color Push 4D Bump
description:
Color Push is the newest colors casual game. The mission is to avoid Obstacles with different to win. This Color Push is free and easy to play and highly addictive. The game is one of the best bump games and it’s the most insane free game of 2019. Beware of hurdles and cross them efficiently with your finger to move the ball forward and pass your levels.

Challenge your friends to play the game to see who is the best!

Features:
- Color escape bump is free to play.
- One finger control.
- Simple and easy control.
- Control the game bump and avoid different obstacles.
- Unlimited unique levels.
- Attractive environment and good graphics.

Download and play the best color push of 2019 and enjoy. Complete different challenges and unlock new levels.

If you have any question regarding the game, feel free to tell us. Your suggestions will help us to improve our game.

Thanks for playing our Color Push game.
